alert.note: Alert for Brevard; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 3:57PM EDT until July 31 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Brevard County in east central Florida... Northeastern Osceola County in east central Florida... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 357 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holopaw, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockledge, Camp Holly Fish Camp, Holopaw, Harmony, and Alligator Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
